descriptionHtml:
--
DESCRIPTION
--

Swaps the models of the Dragonplate set with those of the Dragonscale set. Helmet now included.

Mainly threw this together for myself, as I play Heavy Armor but dislike Dragonplate and Daedric alike. Hope others find this useful too!

Zero potential of harming your game. Easily uninstalled if you change your mind.

--
INSTALL
--

Unzip and drop the included Data folder into your Skyrim folder and hit \"merge.\"

Alternatively, navigate to and unzip \"dragonbone\" to Skyrim / Data / meshes / armor

--
UNINSTALL
--

Delete \"dragonbone\" from Skyrim / Data / meshes / armor
author: Tair
